Articles.Content:
Probably a stupid question, but as I don't see it on the wiki anywhere, I'll ask here.

Is there any way to modify/set action groups while in flight? Or can that only be done from the VAB?

Thanks!

Edited October 27, 2014 by Slam_Jones
You'll need a mod for that.

Probably a stupid question, but as I don't see it on the wiki anywhere, I'll ask here.

Is there any way to modify/set action groups while in flight? Or can that only be done from the VAB?

Thanks!

Only from the VAB/SPH in stock. Mods include Action Group Manager (in-flight editing only) and Action Groups Extended (in-flight editing + a whole new Action Group system that allows many more action groups)

Which one you choose depends one whether you want to compliment the existing system or replace it with a new one entirely.

EDIT:

NOTE 1: Taki's link is outdated, use mine.

NOTE 2: AGM works fine with 0.25 despite not having been updated.

Edited October 27, 2014 by Alshain

Only from the VAB/SPH in stock. Mods include Action Group Manager (in-flight editing only) and Action Groups Extended (in-flight editing + a whole new Action Group system that allows many more action groups)

Which one you choose depends one whether you want to compliment the existing system or replace it with a new one entirely.

EDIT:

NOTE 1: Taki's link is outdated, use mine.

NOTE 2: AGM works fine with 0.25 despite not having been updated.

So it is, thank you. That's what I get for using Google...

Awesome, thanks for the quick replies!

Changing to Answered.
